metadata.name: SIFT: MALFUNCTION
metadata.description:
All that is left are these rusted beasts, sifting through the rubble and thick layers of ash. They are forever fighting in a war that has long since passed.  Beware of the malfunctioning machines roaming the old battlefields.  It will take war tech to destroy themâ€¦ this war tech you must wield. 

Become part of the SIFT world army. Where NFTs collide with film. 
https://sift.world/
